jd: From: Raghu, Smart Folks raghu@smartfolksinc.com Reply to: raghu@smartfolksinc.com Hi,I have an opening for "Postgres DBA" for "Plano TX, 75024" (Day 1 onsite) Job Title: PostgreSQL DBA ArchitectWork Location: Plano, TX 75024Contract duration (in months)* 6Must Have Skills (Top 3 technical skills only) *1. AWS2. PostgreSQL3. DynamoDBNice to have skills (Top 2 only)1. AWS DMS2. QlikDetailed Job Description:1. Hands on experience working in Database Design2. Hands on experience in AWS RDBMS Database Services such as PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, etc3. Should have done Data migration from different Data sources using various tools.4. Implement the Data migration activities through AWS DMS Qlik3. Implementation of Data sync related activities between old and new database for identified use cases.
